name: claude-market
description: Hand-curated open source repository for Claude Code tools, agents and skills

plugins.name: plugin-builder
plugins.description: Interactive plugin builder for Claude Code - serves as both an example plugin and a tool to create new plugins through guided prompts
plugins.author: danielkov

commands.name: init
commands.description: Initialize a new plugin with guided prompts

commands.name: add
commands.description: Add a new component to an existing plugin
